forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 18C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High around 65F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early then becoming cloudy with periods of rain late. Low 12C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early then becoming cloudy with periods of rain late. Low 53F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 16C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 61F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High near 65F. Winds light and variable.
